cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 29th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 29th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Standard 10 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Big room with 5 sets of custom made solid single bunk beds, each bed has its own light, USB charge socks, hooks, hanger and quilt, pillow , sheet, pillowcase, bath towel and air condition for the room. Some beds has blind to get some privacy.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Small room with a set of bunk single bed, bed side cabinet for lower bed shelf for upper bed, each bed has its own light USB charge socks, hook, hanger and quilt, sheet, pillow and pillow case, bath towel and heater for the room

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Room with a queen size bed, bed side table.The bed has its own light,  USB charge socks, hooks, hanger and quilt, sheet, pillow and pillowcase, bath towel. There is heater for the room. The guest of the room shear the kitchen, lounge, dining area, toilet.
